name: Parld
description:
Updates

v0.2 - 2018/12/24 - One more stage, with 3D and 2D, with more any hard level

v0.3 - 2018/12/25 - Three more stages, with new gamemodes.

With these game, you play with one character.

Play with 3 cameras, 2D on 3D, inversion of controls in stages, in others exemples...

If you find any bug or error, please contact me in comments.
